level_rune_01-03.name: Area 59 Ruins
level_rune_01-03.description: This district within Chernobog was abandoned due to its small size and lack of strategic significance. It has since been occupied by wandering enemy forces, and we must recapture it to prevent enemies from slipping through our encirclement.

enemy_reveng_2.description: All [Avengers] and [Hateful Avengers] gain +80% HP and +100% DEF

enemy_reveng_3.description: All [Avengers] and [Hateful Avengers] gain +120% HP, +200% DEF and +80% ATK

global_forbidloc_2.description: 6 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

global_forbidloc_3.description: 10 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

global_squadnum_1.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 10 Operators

global_squadnum_2.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 7 Operators

global_squadnum_3.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 4 Operators

enemy_haxe_2.description: All [Armed Militant] gain +80% HP, +40% ATK, +50 RES and +2 Weight levels

enemy_haxe_3.description: All [Armed Militant] gain +150% HP, +80% ATK, +75 RES and +2 Weight levels

global_costrecovery_1.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 25%

global_costrecovery_2.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 50%

char_exclude_guarddefender_2.description: Guard and Defender Operators cannot be deployed.

char_cost_casterhealer_1.description: The DP Cost of Caster and Medic Operators is tripled.

char_exclude_casterhealer_2.description: Caster and Medic Operators cannot be deployed.
